title: The Visit of Doctor Syntax to the Widow Hopefull [sic] at York
text: The Second Tour of Doctor Syntax, in Search of Consolation traces the hero's wanderings after the death of his wife, who was portrayed in the first series as a rather difficult person. A visit to the Widow Hopeful, it would seem unannounced, was one of Doctor Syntax's first stops after the funeral.
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
